summary:
Everyone can benefit from hearing about Jake's experiences learning Python--what was helpful and what was not! The good and the bad...

- Things to learn before Python: Snap, Squeak,  Logo, Karel the Robot, Alice, Scratch, Tynker, Trinket
- Python tools and environments for learning: Codecademy, Code Combat, Code Skulptor
- Courses:  written tutorials, Coursera, Codecademy
title: How to teach Python to a ten year old
